Joel (435) 773-1220

$309,900

775 E 100 N, #47

Enterprise, UT 84725

MLS# 24-250648

Status: Closed

3 beds | 2 baths | 1311 sqft

Property Description

Move In Ready!!! No HOA!!! Built in 2021 with 1,311 sqft, 3 bed, 2 bath with an attached 2 car garage on a 0.18 acre lot. This is the perfect starter home, investment property or second home. Located only 40 minutes from St. George or Cedar City in the Southern Utah rural city of Enterprise, UT in Washington County. The city of Enterprise enjoys the local services of Washington County schools, Washington County Sheriff's, parks and recreation, grocery, restaurants, hardware, medical, fire, ambulance, reservoirs and plenty of outdoor activities w/ cooler temperatures. Wait until you experience the 4th of July Fireworks, the 24th of July Parade, the August Enterprise Corn Fest, fishing in the city park and the splash pads for kids and grandkids.
